00012 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_CreateFromIntArray(int *records, int totalRecords, int recordsPerPage, char *name)
00013 {
00014     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider = (EaglePageProvider*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePageProvider_CreateFromIntArray.1", sizeof(EaglePageProvider));
00015     if(NULL == pageProvider) {
00016         return NULL;
00017     }
00018     
00019     pageProvider->recordsPerPage = recordsPerPage;
00020     pageProvider->offsetRecords = 0;
00021     pageProvider->totalRecords = totalRecords;
00022     pageProvider->records = records;
00023     pageProvider->nextPage = EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromIntArray_;
00024     pageProvider->pagesRemaining = EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromIntArray_;
00025     pageProvider->add = EaglePageProvider_addUnsupported_;
00026     pageProvider->free = EaglePageProvider_DeleteIntArray_;
00027     pageProvider->nextPageLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00028     pageProvider->name = (NULL == name ? NULL : strdup(name));
00029     pageProvider->reset = EaglePageProvider_resetFromIntArray_;
00030     pageProvider->type = EagleDataTypeInteger;
00031     
00032     return pageProvider;
00033 }

00035 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_CreateFromInt(int value, int recordsPerPage, char *name)
00036 {
00037     int *data = (int*) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePageProvider_CreateFromInt.1", sizeof(int), recordsPerPage), i;
00038     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider;
00039     
00040     if(NULL == data) {
00041         return NULL;
00042     }
00043     
00044     pageProvider = EaglePageProvider_CreateFromIntArray(data, recordsPerPage, recordsPerPage, name);
00045     if(NULL == pageProvider) {
00046         return NULL;
00047     }
00048     pageProvider->nextPage = EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromInt_;
00049     pageProvider->pagesRemaining = EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromInt_;
00050     
00051     for(i = 0; i < recordsPerPage; ++i) {
00052         data[i] = value;
00053     }
00054     
00055     return pageProvider;
00056 }

00058 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemaining(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00059 {
00060     int pagesRemaining;
00061     
00062     /* synchronize this function */
00063     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(epp->nextPageLock);
00064     
00065     pagesRemaining = epp->pagesRemaining(epp);
00066     
00067     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(epp->nextPageLock);
00068     return pagesRemaining;
00069 }
00070 
00071 int EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(int totalRecords, int recordsPerPage)
00072 {
00073     int pagesLeft;
00074     
00075     if(0 == totalRecords || 0 == recordsPerPage) {
00076         return 0;
00077     }
00078     
00079     pagesLeft = totalRecords / recordsPerPage;
00080     if(totalRecords % recordsPerPage > 0) {
00081         ++pagesLeft;
00082     }
00083     
00084     return pagesLeft;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromIntArray_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00088 {
00089     return EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(epp->totalRecords - epp->offsetRecords, epp->recordsPerPage);
00090 }

00092 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromInt_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00093 {
00094     /* unlimited supply of pages */
00095     return 1;
00096 }

00111 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromInt_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00112 {
00113     int *begin = (int*) epp->records;
00114     EaglePage *page;
00115     
00116     page = EaglePage_New(EagleDataTypeInteger, begin, epp->recordsPerPage, epp->recordsPerPage, epp->offsetRecords, EagleFalse);
00117     epp->offsetRecords += epp->recordsPerPage;
00118     
00119     return page;
00120 }
00121 
00122 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromIntArray_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00123 {
00124     int *begin = (int*) epp->records;
00125     int pageSize = MIN(epp->recordsPerPage, epp->totalRecords - epp->offsetRecords);
00126     EaglePage *page;
00127     
00128     page = EaglePage_New(EagleDataTypeInteger, begin + epp->offsetRecords, pageSize, pageSize, epp->offsetRecords, EagleFalse);
00129     epp->offsetRecords += pageSize;
00130     
00131     return page;
00132 }

00137         return;
00138     }
00139     epp->free(epp);
00140     epp = NULL;

00143 void EaglePageProvider_DeleteIntArray_(EaglePageProvider *epp)

00146     EagleMemory_Free(epp->name);
00147     EagleMemory_Free(epp);

00150 void EaglePageProvider_DeleteStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00151 {
00152     EagleLock_Delete(epp->nextPageLock);
00153     EagleLinkedList_DeleteWithItems((EagleLinkedList*) epp->records);
00154     EagleMemory_Free(epp->name);
00155     EagleMemory_Free(epp);
00156 }

00158 EagleBoolean EaglePageProvider_addUnsupported_(EaglePageProvider *epp, void *data)
00159 {
00160     return EagleFalse;
00161 }
00162 
00163 EagleBoolean EaglePageProvider_addStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp, void *data)
00164 {
00165     EagleLinkedList *list = (EagleLinkedList*) epp->records;
00166     EagleLinkedListItem *head = EagleLinkedList_end(list);
00167     EaglePage *page = NULL;
00168     
00169     if(NULL == head || ((EaglePage*) head->obj)->count >= epp->recordsPerPage) {
00170         /* the list is empty we need to create a new page */
00171         EagleLinkedListItem *item;
00172         page = EaglePage_Alloc(epp->type, epp->recordsPerPage);
00173         page->count = 0;
00174         item = EagleLinkedListItem_New(page, EagleTrue, (void (*)(void *obj)) EaglePage_Delete);
00175         EagleLinkedList_add(list, item);
00176     }
00177     else {
00178         page = (EaglePage*) head->obj;
00179     }
00180     
00181     switch(epp->type) {
00182             
00183         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00184             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Unknown type.");
00185             return EagleFalse;
00186             
00187         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00188             ((int*) page->data)[page->count++] = *((int*) data);
00189             break;
00190             
00191         case EagleDataTypeText:
00192             ((char**) page->data)[page->count++] = (char*) data;
00193             break;
00194         
00195     }
00196     
00197     ++epp->totalRecords;
00198     return EagleTrue;
00199 }

00201 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_CreateFromStream(EagleDataType type, int recordsPerPage, char *name)
00202 {
00203     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider = (EaglePageProvider*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePageProvider_CreateFromStream.1", sizeof(EaglePageProvider));
00204     if(NULL == pageProvider) {
00205         return NULL;
00206     }
00207     
00208     switch(type) {
00209             
00210         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00211             EagleMemory_Free(pageProvider);
00212             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Unknown type.");
00213             return NULL;
00214             
00215         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00216             pageProvider->type = EagleDataTypeInteger;
00217             break;
00218             
00219         case EagleDataTypeText:
00220             pageProvider->type = EagleDataTypeText;
00221             break;
00222             
00223     }
00224     
00225     pageProvider->recordsPerPage = recordsPerPage;
00226     pageProvider->offsetRecords = 0;
00227     pageProvider->totalRecords = 0;
00228     pageProvider->records = (void*) EagleLinkedList_New();
00229     pageProvider->reset = EaglePageProvider_resetFromStream_;
00230     pageProvider->free = EaglePageProvider_DeleteStream_;
00231     pageProvider->nextPage = EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromStream_;
00232     pageProvider->pagesRemaining = EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromStream_;
00233     pageProvider->add = EaglePageProvider_addStream_;
00234     pageProvider->nextPageLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00235     pageProvider->name = (NULL == name ? NULL : strdup(name));
00236     pageProvider->cursor = NULL;
00237     
00238     return pageProvider;
00239 }
00240 
00241 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00242 {
00243     return EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(epp->totalRecords - epp->offsetRecords, epp->recordsPerPage);
00244 }
00245 
00246 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00247 {
00248     EagleLinkedList *list = (EagleLinkedList*) epp->records;
00249     EaglePage *page;
00250     
00251     if(NULL == epp->cursor) {
00252         epp->cursor = EagleLinkedList_begin(list);
00253     }
00254     
00255     /* there is no more pages to give */
00256     if(epp->offsetRecords >= epp->totalRecords || NULL == epp->cursor) {
00257         return NULL;
00258     }
00259     
00260     /* always give a duplicate page, so that the original page is not modified or freed */
00261     page = EaglePage_Copy((EaglePage*) epp->cursor->obj);
00262     page->recordOffset = epp->offsetRecords;
00263     epp->offsetRecords += page->count;
00264     epp->cursor = epp->cursor->next;
00265     return page;
00266 }
00267 
00268 EagleBoolean EaglePageProvider_add(EaglePageProvider *epp, void *data)
00269 {
00270     EagleBoolean r;
00271     
00272     /* synchronize this function */
00273     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(epp->nextPageLock);
00274     
00275     r = epp->add(epp, data);
00276     
00277     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(epp->nextPageLock);
00278     return r;
00279 }

00281 void EaglePageProvider_reset(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00282 {
00283     /* synchronize this function */
00284     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(epp->nextPageLock);
00285     
00286     epp->reset(epp);
00287     
00288     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(epp->nextPageLock);
00289 }

00291 void EaglePageProvider_resetFromIntArray_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00292 {
00293     epp->offsetRecords = 0;
00294 }

00296 void EaglePageProvider_resetFromStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00297 {
00298     epp->offsetRecords = 0;
00299     epp->cursor = NULL;
00300 }
